products.name: NEW Fridays™ Messy Cheeseburger
products.description: 100% beef patty dripping with melted cheese. Served on a brioche style bun. Mayo, tomato, pickled red onions with Friday's barbecue glaze on the side.

products.name: NEW Deluxe Wagyu Burger
products.description: The luxury burger. 6oz patty made with the finest wagyu beef, topped with grilled mushrooms, caramelised onions, melted Monterey Jack cheese, served with Friday’s beef dip on the side.

products.name: Fridays™ Glazed Double Stack Burger
products.description: Two 100% beef patties coated in our Fridays™ Legendary Glaze, Monterey Jack cheese, crispy bacon. Served on a brioche style bun, mayo, tomato, and pickled red onions and extra Fridays™ Legendary Glaze on the side.

products.name: Ultimate Cheese Dipper
products.description: Two 100% beef patties with cheese, lettuce, tomato, vodka pickled onions, crispy bacon, with chipotle mayo. Fridays™ Burger Mayo on the side.

products.name: Cheese & Maple Bacon
products.description: Loaded with melted Colby cheese, topped with maple bacon and served with sour cream on the side

products.name: Plant-Based Cheese & Bacon
products.description: Loaded with plant-based bacon pieces, vegan cheese and served with avocado and lime dressing for dipping

products.name: Cheese Nachos
products.description: Corn tortillas topped with cheese, pickled jalapeños, guacamole, fresh salsa and drizzled with sour cream

products.name: Plant-Based Chicken Nachos
products.description: Corn tortillas topped with plant-based chicken pieces, tossed in spicy habanero relish. Served with smoked Applewood cheese, pickled jalapeños, guacamole and fresh salsa, drizzled with avocado and lime dressing

products.name: Chicken
products.description: Two soft taco crusts filled with grilled garlic and lemon chicken, crunchy lettuce, mature cheddar cheese, pico de gallo mix, pineapple, coriander, lime and chipotle glaze

products.name: Meatless Chicken
products.description: Two soft toasted tacos filled with plant-based chicken, dressed in spicy habanero relish. Topped with avocado and lime dressing, pico de gallo, crunchy lettuce, pickled red onions and coriander

products.name: Fridays™ Wings
products.description: Chicken wings tossed in our Fridays™ Legendary Glaze, topped with toasted sesame seeds and chilli flakes

products.name: Hoisin Wings
products.description: Chicken wings tossed in a rich, sticky hoisin sauce, served with fresh lime

products.name: Hot Wings
products.description: Chicken wings tossed in Frank’s RedHot sauce with celery sticks and a blue cheese dip

products.name: Boneless Hot Wings
products.description: Crispy chicken breast chunks tossed in Frank’s RedHot sauce with a blue cheese dip
